00017 #include <gtest/gtest.h>

00019 #include "graph.h"
00020 #include "ninja.h"
00021 
00022 struct ParserTest : public testing::Test,
00023                     public ManifestParser::FileReader {
00024   void AssertParse(const char* input) {
00025     ManifestParser parser(&state, this);
00026     string err;
00027     ASSERT_TRUE(parser.Parse(input, &err)) << err;
00028     ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00029   }
00030 
00031   virtual bool ReadFile(const string& path, string* content, string* err) {
00032     files_read_.push_back(path);
00033     map<string, string>::iterator i = files_.find(path);
00034     if (i == files_.end()) {
00035       *err = "No such file or directory";  // Match strerror() for ENOENT.
00036       return false;
00037     }
00038     *content = i->second;
00039     return true;
00040   }
00041 
00042   State state;
00043   map<string, string> files_;
00044   vector<string> files_read_;
00045 };
00046 
00047 TEST_F(ParserTest, Empty) {
00048   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(""));
00049 }
00050 
00051 TEST_F(ParserTest, Rules) {
00052   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00053 "rule cat\n"
00054 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00055 "\n"
00056 "rule date\n"
00057 "  command = date > $out\n"
00058 "\n"
00059 "build result: cat in_1.cc in-2.O\n"));
00060 
00061   ASSERT_EQ(3u, state.rules_.size());
00062   const Rule* rule = state.rules_.begin()->second;
00063   EXPECT_EQ("cat", rule->name_);
00064   EXPECT_EQ("cat $in > $out", rule->command_.unparsed());
00065 }
00066 
00067 TEST_F(ParserTest, Variables) {
00068   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00069 "l = one-letter-test\n"
00070 "rule link\n"
00071 "  command = ld $l $extra $with_under -o $out $in\n"
00072 "\n"
00073 "extra = -pthread\n"
00074 "with_under = -under\n"
00075 "build a: link b c\n"
00076 "nested1 = 1\n"
00077 "nested2 = $nested1/2\n"
00078 "build supernested: link x\n"
00079 "  extra = $nested2/3\n"));
00080 
00081   ASSERT_EQ(2u, state.edges_.size());
00082   Edge* edge = state.edges_[0];
00083   EXPECT_EQ("ld one-letter-test -pthread -under -o a b c",
00084             edge->EvaluateCommand());
00085   EXPECT_EQ("1/2", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("nested2"));
00086 
00087   edge = state.edges_[1];
00088   EXPECT_EQ("ld one-letter-test 1/2/3 -under -o supernested x",
00089             edge->EvaluateCommand());
00090 }
00091 
00092 TEST_F(ParserTest, VariableScope) {
00093   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00094 "foo = bar\n"
00095 "rule cmd\n"
00096 "  command = cmd $foo $in $out\n"
00097 "\n"
00098 "build inner: cmd a\n"
00099 "  foo = baz\n"
00100 "build outer: cmd b\n"
00101 "\n"  // Extra newline after build line tickles a regression.
00102 ));
00103 
00104   ASSERT_EQ(2u, state.edges_.size());
00105   EXPECT_EQ("cmd baz a inner", state.edges_[0]->EvaluateCommand());
00106   EXPECT_EQ("cmd bar b outer", state.edges_[1]->EvaluateCommand());
00107 }
00108 
00109 TEST_F(ParserTest, Continuation) {
00110   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00111 "rule link\n"
00112 "  command = foo bar $\n"
00113 "    baz\n"
00114 "\n"
00115 "build a: link c $\n"
00116 " d e f\n"));
00117 
00118   ASSERT_EQ(2u, state.rules_.size());
00119   const Rule* rule = state.rules_.begin()->second;
00120   EXPECT_EQ("link", rule->name_);
00121   EXPECT_EQ("foo bar baz", rule->command_.unparsed());
00122 }
00123 
00124 TEST_F(ParserTest, Backslash) {
00125   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00126 "foo = bar\\baz\n"
00127 "foo2 = bar\\ baz\n"
00128 ));
00129   EXPECT_EQ("bar\\baz", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("foo"));
00130   EXPECT_EQ("bar\\ baz", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("foo2"));
00131 }
00132 
00133 TEST_F(ParserTest, Comment) {
00134   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00135 "# this is a comment\n"
00136 "foo = not # a comment\n"));
00137   EXPECT_EQ("not # a comment", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("foo"));
00138 }
00139 
00140 TEST_F(ParserTest, Dollars) {
00141   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00142 "rule foo\n"
00143 "  command = ${out}bar$$baz$$$\n"
00144 "blah\n"
00145 "x = $$dollar\n"
00146 "build $x: foo y\n"
00147 ));
00148   EXPECT_EQ("$dollar", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("x"));
00149   EXPECT_EQ("$dollarbar$baz$blah", state.edges_[0]->EvaluateCommand());
00150 }
00151 
00152 TEST_F(ParserTest, CanonicalizeFile) {
00153   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00154 "rule cat\n"
00155 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00156 "build out: cat in/1 in//2\n"
00157 "build in/1: cat\n"
00158 "build in/2: cat\n"));
00159 
00160   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("in/1"));
00161   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("in/2"));
00162   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("in//1"));
00163   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("in//2"));
00164 }
00165 
00166 TEST_F(ParserTest, PathVariables) {
00167   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00168 "rule cat\n"
00169 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00170 "dir = out\n"
00171 "build $dir/exe: cat src\n"));
00172 
00173   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("$dir/exe"));
00174   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("out/exe"));
00175 }
00176 
00177 TEST_F(ParserTest, CanonicalizePaths) {
00178   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00179 "rule cat\n"
00180 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00181 "build ./out.o: cat ./bar/baz/../foo.cc\n"));
00182 
00183   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("./out.o"));
00184   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("out.o"));
00185   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("./bar/baz/../foo.cc"));
00186   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("bar/foo.cc"));
00187 }
00188 
00189 TEST_F(ParserTest, ReservedWords) {
00190   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00191 "rule build\n"
00192 "  command = rule run $out\n"
00193 "build subninja: build include foo.cc\n"));
00194 }

00196 TEST_F(ParserTest, Errors) {
00197   {
00198     ManifestParser parser(NULL, NULL);
00199     string err;
00200     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("foobar", &err));
00201     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 7: expected '=', got eof", err);
00202   }
00203 
00204   {
00205     ManifestParser parser(NULL, NULL);
00206     string err;
00207     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x 3", &err));
00208     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 3: expected '=', got '3'", err);
00209   }
00210 
00211   {
00212     ManifestParser parser(NULL, NULL);
00213     string err;
00214     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = 3", &err));
00215     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 6: expected newline, got eof", err);
00216   }
00217 
00218   {
00219     State state;
00220     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00221     string err;
00222     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = 3\ny 2", &err));
00223     EXPECT_EQ("line 2, col 3: expected '=', got '2'", err);
00224   }
00225 
00226   {
00227     State state;
00228     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00229     string err;
00230     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = $", &err));
00231     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 3: unexpected eof", err);
00232   }
00233 
00234   {
00235     State state;
00236     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00237     string err;
00238     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = $\n $[\n", &err));
00239     EXPECT_EQ("line 2, col 3: expected variable after $", err);
00240   }
00241 
00242   {
00243     State state;
00244     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00245     string err;
00246     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = a$\n b$\n $\n", &err));
00247     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 1: expected newline, got eof", err);
00248   }
00249 
00250   {
00251     State state;
00252     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00253     string err;
00254     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("build x: y z\n", &err));
00255     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 10: unknown build rule 'y'", err);
00256   }
00257 
00258   {
00259     State state;
00260     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00261     string err;
00262     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("build x:: y z\n", &err));
00263     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 9: expected build command name, got ':'", err);
00264   }
00265 
00266   {
00267     State state;
00268     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00269     string err;
00270     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cat\n  command = cat ok\n"
00271                               "build x: cat $\n :\n",
00272                               &err));
00273     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 2: expected newline, got ':'", err);
00274   }
00275 
00276   {
00277     State state;
00278     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00279     string err;
00280     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cat\n",
00281                               &err));
00282     EXPECT_EQ("line 2, col 1: expected 'command =' line", err);
00283   }
00284 
00285   {
00286     State state;
00287     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00288     string err;
00289     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cat\n  command = ${fafsd\n  foo = bar\n",
00290                               &err));
00291     EXPECT_EQ("line 2, col 20: expected closing curly after ${", err);
00292   }
00293 
00294 
00295   {
00296     State state;
00297     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00298     string err;
00299     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cat\n  command = cat\nbuild $: cat foo\n",
00300                               &err));
00301     // XXX EXPECT_EQ("line 3, col 7: expected variable after $", err);
00302     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 1: expected variable after $", err);
00303   }
00304 
00305   {
00306     State state;
00307     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00308     string err;
00309     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule %foo\n",
00310                               &err));
00311     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 6: expected rule name, got unknown '%'", err);
00312   }
00313 
00314   {
00315     State state;
00316     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00317     string err;
00318     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cc\n  command = foo\n  depfile = bar\n"
00319                               "build a.o b.o: cc c.cc\n",
00320                               &err));
00321     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 16: dependency files only work with "
00322               "single-output rules", err);
00323   }
00324 
00325   {
00326     State state;
00327     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00328     string err;
00329     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cc\n  command = foo\n  othervar = bar\n",
00330                               &err));
00331     EXPECT_EQ("line 3, col 3: unexpected variable 'othervar'", err);
00332   }
00333 
00334   {
00335     State state;
00336     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00337     string err;
00338     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cc\n  command = foo\n"
00339                               "build $: cc bar.cc\n",
00340                               &err));
00341     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 1: expected variable after $", err);
00342   }
00343 }

00345 TEST_F(ParserTest, SubNinja) {
00346   files_["test.ninja"] =
00347     "var = inner\n"
00348     "build $builddir/inner: varref\n";
00349   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00350 "builddir = some_dir/\n"
00351 "rule varref\n"
00352 "  command = varref $var\n"
00353 "var = outer\n"
00354 "build $builddir/outer: varref\n"
00355 "subninja test.ninja\n"
00356 "build $builddir/outer2: varref\n"));
00357   ASSERT_EQ(1u, files_read_.size());
00358 
00359   EXPECT_EQ("test.ninja", files_read_[0]);
00360   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("some_dir/outer"));
00361   // Verify our builddir setting is inherited.
00362   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("some_dir/inner"));
00363 
00364   ASSERT_EQ(3u, state.edges_.size());
00365   EXPECT_EQ("varref outer", state.edges_[0]->EvaluateCommand());
00366   EXPECT_EQ("varref inner", state.edges_[1]->EvaluateCommand());
00367   EXPECT_EQ("varref outer", state.edges_[2]->EvaluateCommand());
00368 }
00369 
00370 TEST_F(ParserTest, MissingSubNinja) {
00371   ManifestParser parser(&state, this);
00372   string err;
00373   EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("subninja foo.ninja\n", &err));
00374   EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 10: loading foo.ninja: No such file or directory",
00375             err);
00376 }

00378 TEST_F(ParserTest, Include) {
00379   files_["include.ninja"] = "var = inner\n";
00380   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00381 "var = outer\n"
00382 "include include.ninja\n"));
00383 
00384   ASSERT_EQ(1u, files_read_.size());
00385   EXPECT_EQ("include.ninja", files_read_[0]);
00386   EXPECT_EQ("inner", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("var"));
00387 }

00389 TEST_F(ParserTest, Implicit) {
00390   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00391 "rule cat\n  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00392 "build foo: cat bar | baz\n"));
00393 
00394   Edge* edge = state.LookupNode("foo")->in_edge_;
00395   ASSERT_TRUE(edge->is_implicit(1));
00396 }
00397 
00398 TEST_F(ParserTest, OrderOnly) {
00399   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00400 "rule cat\n  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00401 "build foo: cat bar || baz\n"));
00402 
00403   Edge* edge = state.LookupNode("foo")->in_edge_;
00404   ASSERT_TRUE(edge->is_order_only(1));
00405 }

00407 TEST(MakefileParser, Basic) {
00408   MakefileParser parser;
00409   string err;
00410   EXPECT_TRUE(parser.Parse(
00411 "build/ninja.o: ninja.cc ninja.h eval_env.h manifest_parser.h\n",
00412       &err));
00413   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00414   EXPECT_EQ("build/ninja.o", parser.out_);
00415   EXPECT_EQ(4u, parser.ins_.size());
00416 }
00417 
00418 TEST(MakefileParser, EarlyNewlineAndWhitespace) {
00419   MakefileParser parser;
00420   string err;
00421   EXPECT_TRUE(parser.Parse(
00422 " \\\n"
00423 "  out: in\n",
00424       &err));
00425   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00426 }
00427 
00428 TEST(MakefileParser, Continuation) {
00429   MakefileParser parser;
00430   string err;
00431   EXPECT_TRUE(parser.Parse(
00432 "foo.o: \\\n"
00433 "  bar.h baz.h\n",
00434       &err));
00435   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00436   EXPECT_EQ("foo.o", parser.out_);
00437   EXPECT_EQ(2u, parser.ins_.size());
00438 }
